snippet.title: Blocky Balloons - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Blocky Balloons is a little block-pushing puzzle game, made for Playdate using Pulp. Push, slide, and undo your way through 40+ puzzles and get those balloons!

Available now at https://brandooo.itch.io/blocky-balloons
